subheading: From humble beginnings to a premier conservation sanctuary, driven by passion and a commitment to nature.

timeline.title: Foundation Established
timeline.description: Al Dosari Reserve was founded with a vision to protect Arabian wildlife and create an eco-tourism destination.

timeline.title: Conservation Programs
timeline.description: Launched comprehensive breeding programs for endangered Arabian Oryx and Gazelles.

timeline.title: Educational Center
timeline.description: Opened the Educational Center to host school trips and environmental workshops.

timeline.title: International Recognition
timeline.description: Received UNESCO recognition for conservation efforts and sustainable tourism practices.

timeline.title: Expansion Phase
timeline.description: Expanded reserve boundaries and introduced new safari experiences and activities.
